author: Liturgist
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Browse to github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell
Scroll down to the "Get PowerShell" section
Select any of the "Instructions" links
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
```none
Page appears telling how to install PowerShell
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
404
This is not the web page you are looking for.
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->
```powershell
Occurs using Chrome on Windows 10
Occurs using Firefox on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
```

comments.author: kwiknick
comments.body:
It looks like a recent commit moved the docs into it's own repo, and I'm wondering if the /installation/*.* folder got missed somehow.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11024062/40893910-28ab3f44-676b-11e8-8319-345a8babc057.png)

comments.author: stknohg
comments.body:
The "Instructions" was removed by #6899.
#6981 has been requested to fix this.

title: "How to Install" "Instructions" for all Windows and Ubuntu version goes to 404
